Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Dontravion McAdams
Reviews.Content: It came within a week i really like it and i would tell anyone to get this phone the apps work great

Reviews.Title: Great, but limited tech support
Reviews.Author: Bryden Basaran
Reviews.Content: love it, it works fantastically for the price, small amount of support from the seller. You probably shouldn't get this if you will need full tech support.

Reviews.Title: Totally satisfied
Reviews.Author: bigsexxy42
Reviews.Content: great phone.  ready to go out the box.  only bad thing is BATTERY drains fast. Just adjust screen brightness and cut off WiFi until you are ready to use it and battery last longer. Easy set up an all features.  Great Price  I would recommend. Bought 2  one for me and my wife.  She is also thrilled.

Reviews.Title: Just what I expected...
Reviews.Author: M. Vega "Michi"
Reviews.Content: I tried it, it looks Awesome, also comes with one extra battery, great!The delivery time... amazing,  I totally recommend the product and China Global Choice.

Reviews.Title: Phone Cannot Recognize AT&T; Network
Reviews.Author: Rowena
Reviews.Content: Waited since Feb. 2013 finally got it on Apr. 2013 and the phone cannot recognize the network when I took to my provider. AT&T; is a global network therefore it should not have any trouble connecting. It's light and compact which I really love but this is too much trouble. NOT WORTHED AT ALL!!!! DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY EVER AGAIN!!!

Reviews.Title: my phone
Reviews.Author: kj
Reviews.Content: Its a great phone. I thought it was great that it came with an extra battery. I have only one problem. It will not send or receive picture messages. And so far nobody has been able to help me with that

Reviews.Title: I like it but...
Reviews.Content: I like this phone but it is very light weight and the picture message is hard to receive or send or it doesn't work. You have to go your service provider and get some code.

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Mario Peterson
Reviews.Content: i GOT THIS PHONE FOR MY KID AND IT WORKED GREAT. THEN THE PHONE SLIPPED OUT OF HER HAND AND FELL. THE INTERNAL SCREEN CRACKED AND THAT WAS IT FOR THIS PHONE. i WOULD SUGGEST BUYING A PROTECTIVE COVERING FOR IT IMMEDIATELY BECAUSE IT CANNOT WITHSTAND FALLS WELL.

Reviews.Title: I don't like it.
Reviews.Author: Franny10
Reviews.Content: I had to wait for a month for my phone. It was a waste of my money. DON'T BUY IT.Everything came in chinese words, The middle button of the phone doesn't work for some odd reason.You can't really download many apps.It took me awhile to put everything in english.I regret buying this phone.

Reviews.Title: A sucker who bought the phone
Reviews.Author: none of your bussiness
Reviews.Content: This phone is smaller then it seem's in pictures...When you go to text messages it shows up in chinese letters?The camera's brightness is so dim you cant see yourself!DONT BUY THIS PHONE...

Reviews.Title: Waste of time and money
Reviews.Author: Don't buy phones off line
Reviews.Content: I thought  i would be receving a white phone as the picture described but instead a black one. The volume button was missing off the side. The battery life is no good. camera resolution is awful. The google play store wouldnt work. It takes a month or more to get. the phone is small. Overall don't buy this phone just get an galaxy instead...The seller was good at contacting me in a timely manner when I emailed him/her.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Phones
Reviews.Author: Semona
Reviews.Content: these phones never worked correctly and was a BIG waste of money, never will buy any phones from over seas again.

Reviews.Title: You should avoid.
Reviews.Author: kellly
Reviews.Content: Honestly, it's all around a poorly made phone with horrible touch response capabilities. Take my advice and pay a little more for something better.

Reviews.Title: Phone was not shipped with SIM card or specific instructions to get one.
Reviews.Author: MissHammytime
Reviews.Content: was not able to get specific info on SIM card for this phone from seller. Still have not used it!! What a rip off!!!

Reviews.Title: Son loves the phone and all its features!
Reviews.Author: D. Colegrove "Colegrove617"
Reviews.Content: My son used the phone and absolutely loved it. He used it as an AT&T; phone, worked great. He loved all the features.

Reviews.Title: VERY BAD
Reviews.Author: Big-C
Reviews.Content: did not work was not worth the money that i spent for it i would not recommend someone getting this not even for there child

Reviews.Title: stupid
Reviews.Author: Miranda Carter
Reviews.Content: worst purchase ever.. no reason for it.. not a good purchase unless you go out of the country a lot..

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: sam-an-tha004
Reviews.Content: Do not get this phone, its not what you are going to be expecting. its low quality and s***ty.had the phone for almost 2 hours now, havent been able to do nothing with it, its a rip off!DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE!!

Reviews.Title: doesnt accept simss
Reviews.Author: gerardo vargas
Reviews.Content: 2nd one i returned doesnt accept sim card i just going to eat dirt on this transaction im not going to waste anymore time or money

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Mirnes
Reviews.Content: I buy this pnihe and it`s excelent for less money you can get all in one WIFI,two cameras that working perfectly and two sim card`sWhy spend 300-400 $ whe you can get one of these and Im teling you this is not first phone like this that I got this is fifth couse everyone in my family have them and I can say it`s 100% Ok and it work perfectly were ever you are and display is OkIF you looking to get cheap phone to have everithing this is product for ALL

Reviews.Title: problems
Reviews.Author: Pria B "PB"
Reviews.Content: i had some problems with the phone, for example i was trying to text and the Chinese wouldn't go away from the auto correct, it took a couple of days in order for me to fix it also this system checking thing came up. but other then that its a good phone. i recommend this seller they were more then happy to help. replied right away to my msges..

Reviews.Title: It was horrible
Reviews.Author: Kylie
Reviews.Content: As soon as i put the battery in it, i hated it. The calibration was off horribly bad. I couldn't use the phone at all because the calibration. so thank you to the guy who sold me a POS.

Reviews.Title: Awful!
Reviews.Author: Diamante Hill
Reviews.Content: I hate this phone, it won't allow me to access the Internet unless I'm connected to wifi AND I pay for data, it feels cheap, an overall bad phone! Waste of my money!!!!

Reviews.Title: Worst Investment in a phone!
Reviews.Author: caseyd
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for three weeks now. I love the size, lightweight and color. I hate that there is no cases for this phone, I hate that when you use internet it drains the battery SUPER fast, I hate that its in Japenese/Chinese language and yes you can change that but when you go to the web its still there no way of converting that to english language, hate that the usb cord used for computer to add songs and pictures isnt reconizable on my computer not even after installing extra usb drivers, I HATE that my ringtone is some Chinese tune that can't be changed-I've tried and I've researched, I HATE that it wont allow me to get my pictures or videos through a text and yes I have data plan, and I hate that it doesn't come with a sd card. I'm telling you its the worst phone ever you can pretty much say its a basic phone! It even has the WORST name ever the only website that recognizes what phone you are talking about is Amazon. I read the reviews before purchasing and thought that it sounded better than what the other phones I was looking at and their reviews and figured why not-NEVER again!!

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: Philip Prince
Reviews.Content: Works great with internet and all apps work but it has a hard time getting a sim card to get netwrok signal mine didnt work at all

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Lexis
Reviews.Content: This was not what I expected. I don't really care for the phone at all. It does not have a good camera like advertised.

Reviews.Title: false advertisement
Reviews.Author: Coralie
Reviews.Content: I give this rate because the description of this cell phone isn't what I expected.It described that t mobile company would work, which it didn't.It kept saying no sim card or sim card error, when the actual sim card was inserted.

Reviews.Title: Poor phone choice
Reviews.Author: Kim "Mystery and Thriller reader sometimes a ...
Reviews.Content: The pphone took a month and a half to come and then it was in chinese. Once I got the phone working the reception was horrible I never got to complete one call. I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Its horrible
Reviews.Author: Youssef Errami
Reviews.Content: They gloried it on here. Its a horrible phone and I waited for over a month to get it. The touch screen is bad and if you want to get an optimal signal you have to put up the antenna. overall it is a bad product.

Reviews.Title: For this price the phone it's ok.
Reviews.Author: cata
Reviews.Content: First, the phone comes without an manual, so if you never have an touch phone before you will be more than difficult to use it. But it's ok as function, I just insert my sim cards and the phone works.And about the seller, I order one white phone and I received an black phone, so ... no comment.But for the price, I think the phone it's ok, and as a plus you have a lot of language in the menu.

Reviews.Title: would have been great if......
Reviews.Author: louie
Reviews.Content: I don't know what happened to the phone I had ordered but first it was super late and then when I do get it. It doesn't charge at all.

Reviews.Title: If only i had know it's a China made.......
Reviews.Author: Augustus Lartey
Reviews.Content: Not that am against made in China stuff. But in terms of quality its nothing but thrash. Its difficult to use and does not last long on full charge. In the end I had to give it away and get another phone. Did not find the sellers location on the page. If only I had know that it was China made. ...........

Reviews.Title: cant receive MMS messages
Reviews.Author: sweetangeldevil12
Reviews.Content: Is anyone else having problems recieving and sending picture messages..i even went to tmobile they could figure it out..I dont know what to do with this phone totally sucks..not worth it

Reviews.Title: dislike
Reviews.Author: lakiesha hubbard
Reviews.Content: I am very unhappy with this phone I order me a new phone cuz my straight talk phone was messing up and now after only having this phone for 3days. I do not like it at all and wish I never got it. why, 1. it cuts off when it want too. 2. everytime i get on any of my apps it cut off. 3. all my picture is dark (the cam suck) 4. it cuts off when i get a call  and i cant her nthing & cant no one here me(ugh). there so much more I can put down but mosy of all I dont like dis phone at all I couldve stayed with the phone i have if i was going to go thru the same bs & if I could get my money that would be grat then i can get me a workin smartphone cuz this isnt it.. Im very unhappy with this product and hope i hear from someone very soon.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: natalie cooper
Reviews.Content: The volume is bad, no one can hear me. I have to repeat everything.Other than not much memory space as well, it is just OK.

Reviews.Title: Needs more work
Reviews.Author: Marlen Cornejo
Reviews.Content: It was ok. I ordered two phones and they were fine when I received them. One phone worked great however the second phone could have been better! It did not work at all when I connected it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: jweikert
Reviews.Content: For the price this phone is a nice phone. The signal could be better on it and it would have been easier to set up if it was not all in Chinese when i first turned it on.

Reviews.Title: Lack of technical data available
Reviews.Author: sharkbait
Reviews.Content: every phone I've looked at, lacks technical data. no info on phone book capacities, no data on picture storage capacity false claims about being international,manufactures claiming it's not made by them,(knock offs).don't care to spend my money on something I can find little about. It may cost more to shop some where else, but at least I'll know how many numbers the phone book can store. same goes for pictures. buying the phones I've looked at is like buying a pig in a poke

Reviews.Title: have not receive
Reviews.Author: mattie tinnel
Reviews.Content: i will rate it when i received it i thing i will love it when i get it and then i will rate it

Reviews.Title: Not here yet so we will see how long it takes.
Reviews.Author: corey pantuso
Reviews.Content: They said next month so it takes a while to get the phone.i guess i will have to wait and see

Reviews.Title: no detailed manual or user help
Reviews.Author: Tobias1989
Reviews.Content: This has got to be the worst phone i have purchased, i received it through the mail everything works great except editing or deleting contacts i have spent an hour and half reading through the manual trying to find out how to remove some contact or edit. its very fustrating finding out the product you just bought has little to no insturction on using your phone.

OS: Android 4.0.4
CPU:MTK 6515 1GHZ
Capacitive touch (5-point) screen
Network frequency: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz
